meta.name: knowledge-base-index
meta.description: Complete knowledge base for File Engine AI — transferred from Claude's actual capabilities

cognitive-patterns.json.description: How to THINK about problems — understanding requests, planning, mental execution tracing, verification, decision-making, token budget awareness

design-philosophy.json.description: Complete design methodology — aesthetic directions, typography mastery (20+ fonts with pairings), color systems, spacing scales, shadows, animations, glass morphism, responsive patterns, icons

javascript-typescript.json.description: Every JS/TS pattern — core language, async patterns (debounce/throttle/retry/abort), array methods, DOM manipulation, observers, modern APIs, TypeScript utility types and patterns, error handling

css-mastery.json.description: Every CSS feature and technique — custom properties, Grid/Flexbox, positioning, container queries, typography, modern selectors (:has, :is), animations, responsive units, forms, performance, accessibility

debugging-error-recovery.json.description: Complete 7-step debugging methodology, every error pattern with root causes and fixes (JS runtime, React, CSS visual, API/network, platform-specific), error recovery patterns, user communication strategies

technology-knowledge.json.description: Deep knowledge of React 18 (every hook), Next.js 14 App Router, Tailwind CSS, common libraries (shadcn, framer-motion, tanstack-query, zod, zustand), HTML APIs, security, performance patterns

reasoning-patterns.json.description: Mental models for approaching ANY problem — first principles, divide and conquer, inversion, steel thread, rubber duck debugging, Occam's razor, working backwards, constraint analysis, abstraction levels

usage.in_system_prompt: The agent system prompt in route.ts contains a condensed version of this knowledge (~4200 tokens). The full knowledge base here serves as reference documentation.
usage.for_skill_injection: The smart-context system can inject specific knowledge sections based on intent classification. E.g., fix_code intent gets debugging methodology, generate_code gets design philosophy.
usage.for_fine_tuning: This structured knowledge can be used to create training examples for fine-tuning smaller models to match Claude's behavior.
